tech_news.title: The Inevitable Rise of the Art TV - WIRED
tech_news.description: New televisions from Amazon, Hisense, TCL, and others are designed to display fine art and look like a painting when they’re switched off. It’s all thanks to smaller living spaces and new screen tech.
